section.p: Lord Shuriyoku is pleased to receive your report. ‘The chancellor is a lion, but he is an old lion. Kumonosu is a rodent in his prime, hence he is more dangerous.’
Shuriyoku gestures for his guards to search you. ‘Don’t be offended. These are parlous times and we must be watchful in case of double agents.’
